Name: Echo Storm
About the game: Survive enemies attack as long as possible in the world of Echo Storm! Use possibility to combine characters, weapons and abilities to become more powerful. Death resets the progress, but the longer you survive, the more abilities your character gets. Onslaught of enemies is growing too and the intensity of the battle is increasing. Find best abilities combination and try to destroy all enemies! Discover the world of Echo Storm Choose start character, weapon and ability which better fit your game style. Find more efficient ways to eliminate specific enemies and ways to evade their attacks. Survive in 3 different locations with a various agressive creatures and conditions. Combine abilities You receive a new ability every time when your level increases. Make unique combinations to get more powerful! Upgrades Unlock new characters, weapons and abilities to get a lot of new ways to survive in the world of Echo Storm! Get into fight now!
